gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Kings 103, Grizzlies 94
gameRecap.excerpt: The Kings win their fourth in a row as they defeat Memphis, 103-94, to move to 27-18 on the year. Domantas Sabonis goes for 20 points, 26 rebounds, and five assists on 10-11 shooting (90.9%). He joins Wilt Chamberlain (6x) as the only players in history since assists were tracked (1956-57) to have such a line (20-25-5-90%). De’Aaron Fox added 23 points, five rebounds, and four assists in the win. Jaren Jackson Jr. led the Grizzlies with 22 points. The Grizzlies move to 18-29.
